data.title: Crunchbase Person Profile
data.meta_description: David has almost 20 years of international financial management experience, principally in the fund management sector in Australia and the U...
data.text:
David has almost 20 years of international financial management experience, principally in the fund management sector in Australia and the United Kingdom. Prior to joining OneVentures David was Finance Director of the Private Markets business of Hermes Investment Management in London. This involved responsibility for the finance and operations

functions of the Real Estate, Private Equity and Infrastructure businesses with in excess of GBP10bn of funds under management. During his time at Hermes David was also responsible for Corporate Finance within the Real Estate business and managed a number of large and complex corporate Real Estate transactions. Prior to this David had experience working for a hospitality private equity manager in London, having initially qualified as a Chartered Accountant with Deloitte in Melbourne. David has a Bachelor of Commerce degree from the University of Western Australia and is a member of the Institute of Chartered Accountants in Australia and New Zealand.
